title: (x) Tennessee Williams italic - Century {Stephen}
content:
Anyone know what italic font this is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1 csdopy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806194110/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1%20csdopy.jpg) | 22.08 KB |
author: Dash_X

comments.content: Looks like a Century. Hard to know which one at this size, but [Century 725](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806194110/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/century_725_ot/?&sample_text=Tennessee%20Williams/) is a good match.
